Add **Django Simple Certmanager** to ``INSTALLED_APPS`` in your Django project's ``settings.py``: .. code-block:: python INSTALLED_APPS = ( # ..., "privates", # Needed for admin usage. "simple_certmanager" )#. Make sure you configure `Django Privates`_ correctly and set the (currently) undocumented settings: .. code-block:: python PRIVATE_MEDIA_ROOT = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, "private-media") PRIVATE_MEDIA_URL = "/private-media/"#.
